Name: Dominance of Earth
Title: Zhongli: Dominance of Earth
Desc: The vastness of rivers flows endless, perpetual upon the tapestry of eons.
Source: Reward for inviting Zhongli to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Dominance of Earth
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1603]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1603] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16033]</color> once.
When your $[A1603], who has this card equipped, has at least 7 HP, the DMG dealt by $[A1603] and the $[K106] from your Summons +1.
(You must have $[A1603] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K106.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>
K106.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
